about_the_game:
Experience the superhuman skill and bravery of a certified forklift operator!
It’s a well kept secret that many forklift operators are actually giraffes, now YOU can experience the thrilling life of a warehouse giraffe!

On wheels or hoofs!


Extreme Forklifting 3 is a level based, third-person driving game with some light platforming when on hoof.
Use your forklift to deliver pallets to their destination, build bridges and traverse dangerous obstacles, in the warehouse anything could happen!
When in giraffe-form you switch between forklifts, jump over gaps and operate equipment such as conveyor belts and levers.

Multiple vehicles!


Drive a nimble 3-wheel electric forklift, or for the heavier loads, use a 4-wheel propane or diesel truck. And when those aren't available, you’ll have to make do with the good old pallet jack.

The latest warehouse fashion!


Customize your forklifts, pallet jacks and create your dream giraffe!
Personalize your pallet moving beaty with stickers, spoilers or cool rims. Give your giraffe that fashionable scarf that matches the brick walls perfectly!

Extreme Forklifting 3, the game you never knew you wanted!

name: Extreme Forklifting 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: i5 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 960 or similar
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Live the dream as a forklift operator! Experience the thrilling life of a warehouse giraffe! Use your trusty forklifts to solve problems and deliver pallets. Pick pallets up, put them down, the only limit is your imagination!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Swedish
